transition_lookup:
SELECT *
FROM transitions
WHERE is_enabled = 1
  AND signal_id = :signal_id
  AND (
        (match_any_state = 0 AND state_id = :state_id)
        OR
        (match_any_state = 1)
      )
ORDER BY match_any_state ASC, priority ASC
LIMIT 1;
transition_next_state:
SELECT s.id AS state_id,
       s.name AS state_name,
       s.key AS state_key,
       t.action_key AS policy_key
FROM transitions t
JOIN states s ON s.id = t.next_state_id
WHERE t.is_enabled = 1
  AND t.signal_id = :signal_id
  AND (
        (t.match_any_state = 0 AND t.state_id = :state_id)
        OR
        (t.match_any_state = 1)
      )
ORDER BY t.match_any_state ASC, t.priority ASC
LIMIT 1;
transition_next_state_by_signal_key:
SELECT s.id AS state_id,
       s.name AS state_name,
       s.key AS state_key,
       t.action_key AS policy_key
FROM transitions t
JOIN states s ON s.id = t.next_state_id
JOIN signals sig ON sig.id = t.signal_id
WHERE t.is_enabled = 1
  AND sig.key = :signal_key
  AND (
        (t.match_any_state = 0 AND t.state_id = :state_id)
        OR
        (t.match_any_state = 1)
      )
ORDER BY t.match_any_state ASC, t.priority ASC
LIMIT 1;
